content.question: Directions: You will participate in a simulated conversation. You will hear a series of 6 questions or statements; after each question or statement, it is your turn to speak. You will have 20 seconds to record each response. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. You will have a conversation with Bai Linlin, your Chinese friend, about ideas for your class trip to China. Prompt 1

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
